entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:21 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -23.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 04:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -23.9°C
Pressure: 103.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -28.4°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:31 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
